summary.span: 這個類別是抽象的。

span.span: This class is abstract.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是抽象基底類別和，這將字元寫入到資料流和字串，分別。 is the abstract base class of and , which write characters to streams and strings, respectively. 建立的執行個體物件寫入字串，將字串寫入至檔案，或將 XML 序列化。Create an instance of to write an object to a string, write strings to a file, or to serialize XML. 您也可以使用的執行個體來將文字寫入至自訂的備份存放區使用的相同 Api，您會使用字串或資料流，或將文字格式的支援。You can also use an instance of to write text to a custom backing store using the same APIs you would use for a string or a stream, or to add support for text formatting. 所有`Write`方法的讓基本資料型別參數寫出為字串值。All the `Write` methods of having primitive data types as parameters write out the values as strings. 根據預設，不是安全執行緒。By default, a is not thread safe. 請參閱安全執行緒包裝函式。See for a thread-safe wrapper. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此類型會實作介面。This type implements the interface. 當您完成使用衍生自此型別的任何型別時，您應該處置它直接或間接。When you have finished using any type that derives from this type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly. 若要直接處置型別，呼叫其方法中的`try` / `catch`區塊。To dispose of the type directly, call its method in a `try`/`catch` block. 若要處置它間接，使用的語言建構這類`using`（在 C# 中) 或`Using`（在 Visual Basic)。To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 Dispose 和中的 「 使用物件，實作 IDisposable 」 一節介面 > 主題。For more information, see Dispose and the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the interface topic. 如需一般 I/O 工作的清單，請參閱 < [ 一般 I/O 工作](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md). ## Examples 類別是抽象類別。The class is an abstract class. 因此，您的程式碼中不必將它執行個體化。Therefore, you do not instantiate it in your code. 類別衍生自，並提供成員的實作，以寫入資料流。The class derives from and provides implementations of the members for writing to a stream. 下列範例示範如何撰寫使用包含的文字檔案的字串值的兩行方法。The following example shows how to write two lines that consist of string values to a text file by using the method. 提供衍生類別中覆寫 DisposeOverride Dispose in a derived class to provide [!code-csharp[System.IO.StreamWriter#23](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.StreamWriter/CS/example23.cs#23)] [!code-vb[System.IO.StreamWriter#23](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.StreamWriter/VB/example23.vb#23)]

summary.span: 關閉目前寫入器並釋放任何與寫入器相關聯的系統資源。

span.span: Closes the current writer and releases any system resources associated with the writer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個實作`Close`呼叫方法並將它傳遞`true`值。This implementation of `Close` calls the method and passes it a `true` value. 排清資料流不會清除其基礎的編碼器，除非您明確地呼叫或`Close`。Flushing the stream will not flush its underlying encoder unless you explicitly call or `Close`. 設定屬性設`true`表示資料會從排清緩衝區資料流，但並不會清除編碼器的狀態。Setting the property to `true` means that data will be flushed from the buffer to the stream, but the encoder state will not be flushed. 這可讓編碼器，讓它可以正確編碼字元的下一個區塊保持其狀態 （部分的字元）。This allows the encoder to keep its state (partial characters) so that it can encode the next block of characters correctly. 這個案例會影響 UTF8，UTF7，其中某些字元可以編碼的編碼器接收或多個相鄰的字元時，才。This scenario affects UTF8 and UTF7 where certain characters can be encoded only after the encoder receives the adjacent character or characters. > [!NOTE] > 在衍生類別中，不會覆寫方法。In derived classes, do not override the method. 相反地，覆寫加入程式碼，以便釋放資源的方法。Instead, override the method to add code for releasing resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用完畢時，請呼叫 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法會將 保留在無法使用的狀態。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 之後呼叫，您必須釋放所有的參考讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體，所佔用。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 清除 Unmanaged 資源向上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)並[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). **附註**永遠為呼叫您釋放最後一個參考之前。**Note** Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否則工作窗格所使用的資源不會釋放，直到記憶體回收行程呼叫 物件的 方法。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's method.

span.para: 可以多次呼叫的其他物件。在覆寫這個方法，小心不要參考先前處置好的呼叫中的物件。如需如何實作這個方法的詳細資訊，請參閱[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。如需詳細資訊並，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源總](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。

span.span: Clears all buffers for the current writer and causes any buffered data to be written to the underlying device.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個預設方法不會執行任何動作，但是在衍生的類別可以覆寫方法，以提供適當的功能。This default method does nothing, but derived classes can override the method to provide the appropriate functionality. 排清資料流不會清除其基礎的編碼器，除非您明確地呼叫`Flush`或。Flushing the stream will not flush its underlying encoder unless you explicitly call `Flush` or . 設定至`true`表示資料會從排清緩衝區資料流，但並不會清除編碼器的狀態。Setting to `true` means that data will be flushed from the buffer to the stream, but the encoder state will not be flushed. 這可讓編碼器，讓它可以正確編碼字元的下一個區塊保持其狀態 （部分的字元）。This allows the encoder to keep its state (partial characters) so that it can encode the next block of characters correctly. UTF8，UTF7，其中某些字元可以只編碼編碼器接收或多個相鄰的字元後，會影響此案例。This scenario affects UTF8 and UTF7 where certain characters can only be encoded after the encoder receives the adjacent character or characters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值屬性會指定您呼叫時，會使用特定文化特性的格式化和方法。The value of the property specifies the culture-specific formatting that is used when you call the and methods. 如果您不想提供的格式提供者，您會建立執行個體使用建構函式，設定屬性設`null`。If you do not want to provide a format provider, you create an instance by using the constructor, which sets the property to `null`. 當屬性包含`null`，目前執行緒文化特性會用於格式化。When the property contains `null`, the culture of the current thread is used for formatting. 如需建立檔案，並將文字寫入至檔案的範例，請參閱 < [ 如何： 將文字寫入至檔案](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-write-text-to-a-file.md)。For an example of creating a file and writing text to a file, see [How to: Write Text to a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-write-text-to-a-file.md). 從檔案讀取文字的範例，請參閱 < [ 如何： 從檔案讀取文字](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-read-text-from-a-file.md)。For an example of reading text from a file, see [How to: Read Text from a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-read-text-from-a-file.md). 如需讀取和寫入二進位檔案的範例，請參閱 < [ 如何： 讀取和寫入至新建立的資料檔案](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-read-and-write-to-a-newly-created-data-file.md)。For an example of reading from and writing to a binary file, see [How to: Read and Write to a Newly Created Data File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-read-and-write-to-a-newly-created-data-file.md). 如需一般 I/O 工作的清單，請參閱 < [ 一般 I/O 工作](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設行結束字元字串是歸位字元後面接著換行字元 ("\r\n")。The default line terminator string is a carriage return followed by a line feed ("\r\n"). 行結束字元字串寫入文字資料流，每一次的`WriteLine`方法呼叫。The line terminator string is written to the text stream whenever one of the `WriteLine` methods is called. 為了讓所撰寫的文字`TextWriter`是由讀取，只有"\n"或"\r\n"應該做為結束字元的字串。In order for text written by the `TextWriter` to be readable by a , only "\n" or "\r\n" should be used as terminator strings. 如果`NewLine`設為`null`，改為使用預設的新行字元。If `NewLine` is set to `null`, the default newline character is used instead. 如需一般 I/O 工作的清單，請參閱 < [ 一般 I/O 工作](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md).

param.name: format

span.span: Writes a formatted string to the text string or stream, using the same semantics as the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會使用複合格式化物件的值轉換為其字串表示，並在字串中內嵌該表示法。This method uses composite formatting to convert the value of an object to its string representation and to embed that representation in a string. .NET 可廣泛的格式化支援，這會在下列格式化主題中的更詳細地說明：.NET provides extensive formatting support, which is described in greater detail in the following formatting topics: - 如需複合格式功能的詳細資訊，請參閱[複合格式](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md)。For more information about the composite formatting feature, see [Composite Formatting](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md). - 如需有關數值格式規範的詳細資訊，請參閱[標準數值格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md)並[自訂數值格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md)。For more information about numeric format specifiers, see [Standard Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md) and [Custom Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md). - 如需有關日期和時間格式規範的詳細資訊，請參閱[標準日期和時間格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)並[自訂日期和時間格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md)。For more information about date and time format specifiers, see [Standard Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md) and [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md). - 如需列舉格式規範的詳細資訊，請參閱[列舉格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/enumeration-format-strings.md)。For more information about enumeration format specifiers, see [Enumeration Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/enumeration-format-strings.md). - 如需有關格式的詳細資訊，請參閱[格式化型別](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For more information about formatting, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md). `format`參數是由零個或多個文字執行混合零或多個索引的預留位置，稱為格式項目，對應至這個方法的參數清單中的物件。The `format` parameter consists of zero or more runs of text intermixed with zero or more indexed placeholders, called format items, that correspond to an object in the parameter list of this method. 格式化的程序會將每個格式項目取代對應的物件值的字串表示。The formatting process replaces each format item with the string representation of the value of the corresponding object. 格式項目的語法如下所示：The syntax of a format item is as follows: {*index*[，*長度*] [:*formatString*]}{*index*[,*length*][:*formatString*]} 在方括號中的元素是選擇性的元素。Elements in square brackets are optional. 下表說明每個元素。The following table describes each element. 如需複合格式功能，包括的格式項目語法的詳細資訊請參閱 < [ 複合格式](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md)。For more information about the composite formatting feature, including the syntax of a format item, see [Composite Formatting](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md). |元素Element|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |索引index|參數清單中要格式化之物件的以零為起始位置。The zero-based position in the parameter list of the object to be formatted. 如果所指定的物件*index*是`null`，格式項目取代為。If the object specified by *index* is `null`, the format item is replaced by . 因為這個多載具有單一物件，其參數中列出，值*index*必須一律為 0。Because this overload has only a single object in its parameter list, the value of *index* must always be 0. 如果在沒有參數*index*位置，就會擲回。If there is no parameter in the *index* position, a is thrown.| |*長度*,*length*|參數的字串表示法中的字元數目下限。The minimum number of characters in the string representation of the parameter. 如果是正數，參數會靠右對齊;如果是負數，它是靠左對齊。If positive, the parameter is right-aligned; if negative, it is left-aligned.| |:*formatString*:*formatString*|標準或自訂格式字串格式化的物件所支援。A standard or custom format string that is supported by the object to be formatted. 可能值為*formatString*的物件所支援的值相同`ToString(string format)`方法。Possible values for *formatString* are the same as the values supported by the object's `ToString(string format)` method. 如果*formatString*未指定及要格式化的物件會實作介面，`null`的值會傳遞`format`參數來當做格式字串。If *formatString* is not specified and the object to be formatted implements the interface, `null` is passed as the value of the `format` parameter that is used as the format string.| 前置和結尾大括號字元，"{"和"}"，所需。The leading and trailing brace characters, "{" and "}", are required. 若要指定在單一的常值大括號字元`format`、 指定兩個開頭或結尾大括號字元; 也就是"{{"或"}}"。To specify a single literal brace character in `format`, specify two leading or trailing brace characters; that is, "{{" or "}}". 。. 這個方法不會在指定的字串中搜尋個別的新行字元 (十六進位的 0x000a)，也不會以 取代它們。This method does not search the specified string for individual newline characters (hexadecimal 0x000a) and replace them with . 如果格式字串中未參考指定的物件，則會忽略它。If a specified object is not referenced in the format string, it is ignored. 如需一般 I/O 工作的清單，請參閱 < [ 一般 I/O 工作](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md).

Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md). - 如需列舉格式規範的詳細資訊，請參閱[列舉格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/enumeration-format-strings.md)。For more information about enumeration format specifiers, see [Enumeration Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/enumeration-format-strings.md). - 如需有關格式的詳細資訊，請參閱[格式化型別](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For more information about formatting, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md). `format`參數是由零個或多個文字執行混合零或多個索引的預留位置，稱為格式項目，對應至這個方法的參數清單中的物件。The `format` parameter consists of zero or more runs of text intermixed with zero or more indexed placeholders, called format items, that correspond to an object in the parameter list of this method. 格式化的程序會將每個格式項目取代對應的物件值的字串表示。The formatting process replaces each format item with the string representation of the value of the corresponding object. 格式項目的語法如下所示：The syntax of a format item is as follows: {*index*[，*長度*] [:*formatString*]}{*index*[,*length*][:*formatString*]} 在方括號中的元素是選擇性的元素。Elements in square brackets are optional. 下表說明每個元素。The following table describes each element. 如需複合格式功能，包括的格式項目語法的詳細資訊請參閱 < [ 複合格式](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md)。For more information about the composite formatting feature, including the syntax of a format item, see [Composite Formatting](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md). |元素Element|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |索引index|參數清單中要格式化之物件的以零為起始位置。The zero-based position in the parameter list of the object to be formatted. 如果所指定的物件*index*是`null`，格式項目取代為。If the object specified by *index* is `null`, the format item is replaced by . 因為這個多載具有三個物件，其參數中列出，值*index*必須一律是 0、 1 或 2。Because this overload has three objects in its parameter list, the value of *index* must always be 0, 1, or 2. 如果在沒有參數*index*位置，就會擲回。If there is no parameter in the *index* position, a is thrown.| |*長度*,*length*|參數的字串表示法中的字元數目下限。The minimum number of characters in the string representation of the parameter. 如果是正數，參數會靠右對齊;如果是負數，它是靠左對齊。If positive, the parameter is right-aligned; if negative, it is left-aligned.| |:*formatString*:*formatString*|標準或自訂格式字串格式化的物件所支援。A standard or custom format string that is supported by the object to be formatted. 可能值為*formatString*的物件所支援的值相同`ToString(string format)`方法。Possible values for *formatString* are the same as the values supported by the object's `ToString(string format)` method. 如果*formatString*未指定及要格式化的物件會實作介面，`null`的值會傳遞`format`參數來當做格式字串。If *formatString* is not specified and the object to be formatted implements the interface, `null` is passed as the value of the `format` parameter that is used as the format string.| 前置和結尾大括號字元，"{"和"}"，所需。The leading and trailing brace characters, "{" and "}", are required. 若要指定在單一的常值大括號字元`format`、 指定兩個開頭或結尾大括號字元; 也就是"{{"或"}}"。To specify a single literal brace character in `format`, specify two leading or trailing brace characters; that is, "{{" or "}}". 這個方法不會在指定的字串中搜尋個別的新行字元 (十六進位的 0x000a)，也不會以 取代它們。This method does not search the specified string for individual newline characters (hexadecimal 0x000a) and replace them with . 如果格式字串中未參考指定的物件，則會忽略它。If a specified object is not referenced in the format string, it is ignored. 行結束字元是由 欄位所定義。The line terminator is defined by the field. 如需一般 I/O 工作的清單，請參閱 < [ 一般 I/O 工作](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md).
